description: Greenwich Leisure Limited has unveiled some new plans for the popular leisure centre.
title: Eastbourne: Operator confirms reopening date of Sovereign Centre
title_page: Eastbourne: Operator confirms reopening date of Sovereign Centre - BBC News
maintext:
The new operator of a popular leisure centre has confirmed its reopening date.
The Sovereign Centre was managed by Eastbourne Borough Council but due to costs, the local authority closed some facilities in the leisure centre while it looked for a new operator.
The leisure centre is now under the management of Greenwich Leisure Limited (GLL) and says it aims to re-open the Fun Pool on 5 April and has plans for an Opening Weekend event before the Easter school holidays.
A spokesperson for GLL said: "Over the next three years we will invest a minimum of Â£1 million in collaboration with Eastbourne Borough Council."
